categorize.name: Categorize Workflows
categorize.description: Access a library full of workflows to help you categorize all kinds of data such as text, image and audio. So you can save time labelling and focus on the analysis that matters most to you.

generate.name: Generate Workflows
generate.description: Generate all kinds of new content off your data, from blogs, images, faqs to customer responses.

insight.name: Insight Workflows
insight.description: Expertly curated workflows that will automatically analyze and generate insightful charts, reports or dashboards on your data.

enrich.name: Enrich Workflows
enrich.description: Access a library full of workflows to enrich your data with all sorts of information such as sentiment, emotions, and more. Helping you find more insights out of your data.

clean.name: Cleaning Workflows
clean.description: Save time manually defining rules to clean up data with workflows such as anonymization, html removal and more.

integration.name: Integrations
integration.description: Import data from all kinds of different places such as social media, app store, conversations and more.

export.name: Export Workflows
export.description: Export your analysis back out to commonly used formats such as standard CSVs, wide-format CSVs and more.

text.name: Text Workflows
text.description: Access a library of state-of-the-art NLP (Natural Language Processing) workflows to help you maximize the utility of your text data. Includes popular workflows such as sentiment analysis, categorization, tagging and more.

audio.name: Audio Workflows
audio.description: Access a library of state-of-the-art NLP Audio processing workflows. Includes popular workflows such as AI transcriptions, conversation summarization, speaker diarization and more.

image.name: Image Workflows
image.description: Access a library of state-of-the-art CV (Computer Vision) workflows to help you extract all sorts of information from your image data. Includes popular workflows such as tagging, AI image modification and more

other.name: Other Workflows
other.description: Workflows that support data types other than text, audio, image and video. Such as PDFs, 3D objects and more.
